entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley disappeared for a couple of hours and returned with armfuls of bottles of butterbeer, pumpkin fizz, and several bags full of Honeydukes sweets.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson squealed as George started throwing Peppermint Toads into the crowd.
